casebody.data:
Linwood Hugh CARTER, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. TAYLOR DIVING & SALVAGE CO., and Brown & Root, Inc., Defendants-Appellees. No. 72-2001. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Jan. 15, 1973. Darryl J. Tsehirn, New Orleans, La., for plaintiff-appellant. Lawrence J. Ernst, New Orleans, La., for defendant-appellee.

Before GEWIN, BELL and GOD-BOLD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

For reasons sufficiently stated in the opinion of the District Court, 341 F.Supp. 628 (E.D.La.), the judgment is affirmed.
